institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 6 (Appointment and Dismissal of Deliberation Committee Members)
contents: Article 6 (Appointment and dismissal of deliberation committee members) ① The deliberation committee manpower pool is selected by the chairman through open recruitment, external recommendation, etc. from among those who fall under any of the following items. However, the chairman may appoint a manager or officer in charge of a related central administrative agency, such as the Ministry of Employment and Labor, as an ex officio member. Revised 2021. 9. 10. 1. A person who is or has worked as an associate professor (research member) or higher, 2. 7 years in the industrial field of machinery, electricity/electronics, information and communication, office management, human resource development, etc. An executive with more than 10 years of service experience or a person with more than 10 years of service experience; 3. Any other person recognized by the chairman as having specialized knowledge regarding vocational competency development projects; ② The chairman of the board shall form a deliberation committee to hold a deliberation committee. The majority of the city must be comprised of civilian members. Revised September 10, 2021, ③ If a member of the deliberation committee falls under any of the following items, the Chairman of the Board of Directors shall dismiss the member. Newly established on December 26, 2019, 1. When performance of duties becomes extremely difficult or impossible due to a physical or mental disability, 2. When a member requests resignation, 3. When there is misconduct or damage to dignity related to the activities of the Consortium Deliberation Committee. 4. When a member does not evade the request despite falling under Article 6-2, Paragraph 3; 5. When the member is deemed unsuitable as a member of the deliberation committee for other reasons.
